full_summary:
**Procurement Notice**

# Reference Number
W6369-23-X045

# Amendment Number
4

# Solicitation Number
W6369-23-X045

## Notice Details
- **Publication Date**: July 12, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: August 10, 2023, 2:00 PM ET
- **Amendment Date**: August 4, 2023
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: To be determined
- **Expected Contract End Date**: To be determined
- **Tender Status**: Cancelled

## Business Requirements
The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for the provision of Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS). The required services include:

* Three (3) Junior Application Services Testers for User Acceptance Testing (UAT) and software testing for the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF).
* One (1) Level 3 Senior Project Manager to oversee the continued development and implementation of the Justice Administrative Information Management Systems (JAIMS).
* One (1) Level 2 Intermediate Project Manager to support the project management of various military justice statutory and regulatory reform projects.

## Contract Details
The contract will be awarded for a two (2) year period with the option to extend for up to two (2) additional one-year periods. The estimated level of effort is 480 days for the testers and 240 days for the project manager.

## Security Requirements
* Custom Security Requirement Level (SRCL)
* Minimum Corporate Security Required: Protected B level
* Minimum Resource Security Required: Reliability Status

## Notes
This procurement is open to qualified TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who are registered in the National Capital Region (NCR) for the category of A.11 Testers, Level 1, and P.9 Project Managers, Level 2 and 3. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.

You can contact Rogelio Orsetti at rog detected en comment._orsettipetrocelli@forces.gc.ca or (613) 715-0853 for further information and clarifications on this notice.
